item.description:
Brazillian Jiu Jitsu is widely considered the most practical martial art there is (you may have seen it on the UFC or cage fighting events) Mike, your host, has been competing and training in BJJ for 5+ years- it is the most practical and fun martial art out there (Mike also trains in Judo, Boxing, Wrestling).  In addition, it is great for women because it focuses more on technique than it does strength.

We are holding a group lesson that will introduce you to BJJ/Grappling. Bring workout/gym attire, it will go for about 2 hours and is only $15.00
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Mike (see photo) inside the venue.
item.name: Intro Brazillian Jiu-Jitsu/Self Defense Group Lesson
